link.title: Hebron Elementary School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: Updated April 3, 2020: All Hebron Schools are closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. E-Learning will continue on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays with the exception of Monday, April 13, 2020.
For more information from the state regarding Coronavirus, please go to their website: https://www.in.gov/coronavirus/

span.strong: The mission of the MSD of Boone Township is to educate and prepare today’s students for tomorrow’s challenges.

div.a: Meals for Students in Need Update

p.span:
This is an update from Tom Gordon, Food Service Director.
Bulk style grab and go bags (5 days of meals) will be served on Tuesdays only at two locations in Hebron . Click on "Read More" for more information.
